pkgmetadata.longdescription: # openstack-image-manager[![PyPi version](https://badgen.net/pypi/v/openstack-image-manager/)](https://pypi.org/project/openstack-image-manager/)[![PyPi license](https://badgen.net/pypi/license/openstack-image-manager/)](https://pypi.org/project/openstack-image-manager/)Easily manage and keep up to date a large number of images on an OpenStack environmentDocumentation: <https://docs.scs.community/docs/category/openstack-image-manager/>
